CustomField.formula: CASE(CCMI__Status_Enum__c, 2, 'Task is complete', -1, IF(ISPICKVAL(CCMI__Status__c, 'On Hold'), 'Task is on hold', ''), IF(CCMI__End__c < TODAY(), 'Task is ending late', IF(CCMI__Status_Enum__c == 0 && CCMI__Start__c < TODAY(), 'Task is starting late', 'Task is on time') ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The reason for the current Timeline Health status.
CustomField.label: Timeline Health Reason
